Class Inode

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inode

  • public class Inode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads an Inode and all the metadata it provides

      java.lang.String readPermissions()
      This method uses bitwise ANDing on FileSystem's i_mode variable value, to determing what permissions a directory or file has.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read()
        This method will read all the data that is contained in the inode, from the buffer, in which the byte array was parsed

      • readPermissions

        public java.lang.String readPermissions()
        This method uses bitwise ANDing on FileSystem's i_mode variable value, to determing what permissions a directory or file has.
        Returns:
        a String with the full permissions of a file or directory

      • getBlockPointers

        public int[] getBlockPointers()
        Returns:
        the array of all the data pointers in an inode

        Returns:
        If the guest has root access or not
